message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and a symbol of its creator's passion. Given its significance, I believe it deserves a new owner who will appreciate it as much as I have. Considering its rarity and the effort put into it, I am offering this product to you at a special price of $15000. I trust that this offer reflects both the value of the product and my desire to find it a worthy successor. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can arrange a transaction that benefits us both.
